cant_find_equipment: CAN’T FIND THE EQUIPMENT YOU NEED?
cant_find_equipment_details: If the process equipment you’re looking for isn’t listed on our website, contact us at
cant_find_do: We’ll do our best to source it for you.

faq.main_activities: What are the main activities of Salloum Company?
faq.main_activities_answer: Salloum Company specializes in the sale, purchase, and resale of used industrial equipment. We offer sales, purchase, brokerage, and consignment services for recent used equipment used in various industrial processes.
faq.types_of_equipment: What types of industrial equipment do you sell?
faq.types_of_equipment_answer: We offer a wide range of used industrial equipment, including machinery, equipment, and complete units, covering all industrial sectors.
faq.how_to_purchase: How can I purchase equipment from Salloum Company?
faq.how_to_purchase_answer: To purchase equipment, you can consult our online catalog, contact us directly for personalized advice, or speak to one of our experts available 24/7.
faq.buy_used_equipment: Does Salloum Company buy used industrial equipment?
faq.buy_used_equipment_answer: Yes, we also buy used industrial equipment. If you have any machinery or equipment to sell, contact us for an evaluation and offer.
faq.brokerage_services: Do you offer brokerage services for industrial equipment?
faq.brokerage_services_answer: Yes, we offer brokerage services to facilitate the sale and purchase of industrial equipment between different parties.
faq.advantages_of_buying: What are the advantages of buying used equipment from Salloum Company?
faq.advantages_of_buying_answer: When you buy from us, you get quick access to high-performance equipment, save on costs compared to new equipment, and receive 24/7 expert support.
faq.countries_active: In how many countries is Salloum Company active?
faq.countries_active_answer: Salloum Company has an international reach, with operations in over 35 countries.
faq.type_of_support: What type of support do you offer?
faq.type_of_support_answer: We offer expert support available 24/7 to answer all your questions and help you with your purchases and sales of industrial equipment.
faq.visit_warehouse: Can I visit your warehouse to see the available equipment?
faq.visit_warehouse_answer: Yes, we encourage our customers to visit our warehouse to inspect the available equipment. Please contact us to make an appointment.
faq.get_appraisal: How do I get an appraisal for my used industrial equipment?
faq.get_appraisal_answer: You can get an assessment by contacting us directly. Our experts will assess your equipment and provide you with a competitive offer.
